page.title: 16TOURISM IN CORBRIDGE
page.content: Corbridge is an important tourist centre because of the Roman remains at Corstopitum,the Saxon church and its shops.In the summer season a tourist information centre operates from the Pele Tower.This arranges accommodation for tourists and carries a supply of maps and leaflets for the area.There are 5 hotels in Corbridge and several private houses provide bed and breakfast.During the week many coach tours stop off in Corbridge en route for Scotland and the Roman Wall.As well as British tourists,there are coaches from Scandinavia,Western Europe and the U.S.A. Several shops sell souvenirs and postcards for the tourists and three cafes and a restaurant cater for their needs.In the summer,local people relax and sunbathe by the riverside.
